entity.name: Andrew Cuomo
entity.description: Governor of New York, Andrew Cuomo

text: @NYGovCuomo What science did you use when you kept infected people in nursing homes and killed off the most vulnerable to the virus?! Trump has made it clear that if states need aid with the Coronavirus he is willing to help, but governors need to run their states.
